channel.title: Commands help
channel.description: how do i make an ::yell command?

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You can use a switch statement and cases that look something like

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String yell = command.substring(5);
switch (playerRights) {
default:
yell(""+playerName+"");
break;

    }

}[/code]

etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @nubers nubers
item.description:
@nubers wrote:

try this…

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						if(c.playerRights == 0){
						c.sendMessage("Yell channel has been disabled for players.");
						return;
						}
						switch (c.playerRights){
							case 0:
								/*c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col>"+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))+"");*/
							break;
							case 1:
								c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
							break;
							case 2:
								c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
							break;
							case 3:
								c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
							break;
							case 4:
								c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col><img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
							break;
							case 5:
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Yell]</col><img=5>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
							break;
						}
					}
				}
			}

btw i just copied and pasted this from one of my command list so mite not work

i.e. 317 testscape/cheesescape, 508 etc etc etc
